paragraph.paragraph: Many operations in EiffelBuild do not require the use of the mouse. The same effect can be achieved through the keyboard only.
This page gathers all the keyboard shortcuts available in the environment.
paragraph.heading: 2Key shortcut reference
paragraph.paragraph: Note: These shortcuts are not always available and are dependent on the state of EiffelBuild. For example, Ctrl+S does nothing if there is no modified project open.
